page.description: Specify the inline style for the Grid's tag.

section.description: Clicking the [...] button next to the Table tag inline style properties opens the style editor. This lets you style css, size, font, color, and other settings in your property grid.
After clicking OK in the style editor any setting adjustments will be added to the Table tag inline style property.
